name:
डॉ. थल्लाडा भास्कर
Dr. Thallada Bhaskar
duties:
i) Realising the mission of the National Laboratory

ii) Creating an environment in the National Laboratory conducive to nurturing of innovation and high class R&D and the other S&T activities of the laboratory

iii) Managing the affairs of the National Laboratory as per the decisions of the Management Council.
